topic.title: .bit Sites
topic.body: Is it possible to browse .bit sites via the browser? Is there a proxy?

topic.title: normal .bit websites.
topic.body: How would i connect to say... dot-bit.bit in my browser with out using bit.no.com?

1_1Bugx9zqizRw7N2UQvktWnXxupmC39TDtD.body:
> [waterrabbit](#comment_101_1LxkfGxtWhktAJ5WJ9ZnKxksTSH37qm8cC): https://bit.no.com:43110

Look At:

> [mkg20001](#comment_6_177ia43eQrnWCHCWt1ik6viQGRzWuNXGzD): There is this: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/zeronet-protocol/cpkpdcdljfbnepgfejplkhdnopniieopShould work, for chrome

2_17U149zMQuTXJ53cXGLyDfrGEoztPiFkjc.body:
